II.i.2.A.2.f
.
Checking for COD
Follow the guidance in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.A.1.p
if the discharge document shows service that was
not
honorable, general, or under honorable conditions.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Process Overview for Screening Mail
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
